ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And I swear by the falling of the stars -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So I call the placement of the stars to witness --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: No! I swear by the positions of the stars –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I do not need to swear by the setting of the stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So I swear by the setting places of the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Fala! I swear by the Mawaqi` of the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But nay! I swear by the falling of stars;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No! I swear by the fallings of the stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, I swear by the places of the stars -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Nay, I swear by the setting of the stars --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I swear by the setting of the stars -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I swear by the places where the stars set!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Furthermore I call to witness the setting of the Stars,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So I swear by Mawaqi (setting or the mansions, etc.) of the stars (they traverse).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I swear by the fallings of the stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I swear by the locations of the stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then I swear by the setting of the stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:75] Nay, I swear (fa-lā uqsimu: lā is extra) by the setting-places of the stars!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 645 (Nay, I swear by the places of the stars) I swear by the revelation of the Qur'an in instalments (nujuman) unto Muhammad (pbuh).
